title: TFT Weekly Missions
body:
Anyone else weekly missions not working? Played maybe 4 games today and no stat has incremented at all?

Unsure if this is known and/or experience by another player?


Cheers

replies.body: I have the same problem as well. Hope we will get the mission rewards still:(
Same issue.  Missions all disappeared and the orb has said "Hold on, creating a new orb" for about 6 hours now.
same here , i hop they fix it soon :(
yes i have the same problem
Yeah, it's bugged for me as well.
same issue. not even the daily 5 for the orb don't count...
i have the same problem, and the orb of enlightenment is not charging up too.

*2nd update* 

A new mission has been added: (If you played while mission progression was bugged)

"Play 1 game. (You have this mission because you played during a missions outage)" & is worth 250 points.

> [{quoted}](name=Dying In Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=9NpJdzU4,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-08-30T02:48:47.728+0000)
>
> *2nd update* 
> 
> A new mission has been added: (If you played while mission progression was bugged)
> 
> "Play 1 game. (You have this mission because you played during a missions outage)" & is worth 250 points.

I saw that and that's cool and all ... but now that mission is bugged out, too. :")
Interesting, worked straight away for me.

*Update*

They are working as of this moment for myself. Previous games have not contributed to any statistic.

Cheers
Same here, this morning I saw the new weekly missions, but they disappeared and now I see the old weekly "complete!" missions
